programme.title: Arsenal vs. Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Arsenal have won their last eight Premier League games against Wolves, their longest winning run against an opponent since a run of 10 against Burnley from 2010 to 2019. Wolves have won just one of their last 14 away league games against Arsenal, losing the last four in a row since a 2-1 victory in November 2020.

programme.title: Sunderland vs. Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Newcastle’s Bruno Guimaraes has scored five Premier League goals this season, only netting more in a single campaign in 2023-24. However, all five of his strikes this season have come in home games, while nine of his last 10 overall have come at St James’ Park. After a run of 22 Premier League games without a goal, Newcastle’s Anthony Gordon has now scored in both of his last two – he’s never scored in three in a row before. Both of his goals have come from the penalty spot, with no Magpies player scoring a penalty in three consecutive Premier League games before.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Brighton and Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their eight Premier League home games against Brighton, though it was the only other time they’ve faced them as the competition’s reigning champions. Mohamed Salah has been an unused substitute in two of Liverpool’s last three Premier League matches – he’d only been an unused sub in three of the first 303 matchday squads he featured in for the Reds. This season is Salah’s lowest tallies per 90 minutes for Liverpool for shots, shots on target and touches in the opposition box.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Eintracht Frankfurt - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona have failed to win either of their two meetings against Eintracht Frankfurt to date, with both of those coming in the UEFA Europa League semi-finals in 2021-22. Ahead of the third meeting between Barcelona and Eintracht Frankfurt, the Catalan side have only faced two other opponents as many as three times in European competition without recording a victory: Dundee United and Strasbourg.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Internazionale and Liverpool have faced each other on six previous occasions – all in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League – with the Reds winning four of the six to date. Five of the last six meetings between Internazionale and Liverpool have seen one of the sides win and keep a clean sheet. Indeed, not since their first meeting in May 1965 have both sides scored in this fixture.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Athletic Club and Paris SG have met twice previously in European competition, with both sides winning their home match in the group stage of the 2011-12 UEFA Europa League. Paris SG have won each of their last three away games against Spanish sides in major European competition, all within the last three seasons. This is as many victories as they managed across their previous 13 away games against Spanish opponents in major European competition combined.

programme.title: Los Angeles - Stories From the City
programme.desc: which will host the FIFA World Cup 2026, its cultural, grassroots and community dimensions of football

programme.title: Club Brugge vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Club Brugge have faced 12 different English sides in European competition, but this will be their first against Arsenal. The Belgian side have only won one of their last 18 matches against English opposition, although that win did come in the UEFA Champions League last term. Arsenal’s last defeat against a Belgian side came in October 1981, having gone unbeaten in their last nine such matches since then. They’re also unbeaten in their last four away matches against Belgian sides since that loss to KFC Winterslag in 1981.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This will be the 15th time that Real Madrid and Manchester City have faced each other in the UEFA Champions League. Since their first meeting in the 2012-13 season, it is already the most-played fixture in the competition in this period. Manchester City have lost their last two games against Real Madrid, suffering defeats home and away against them in last season’s play-off round. This is as many losses as they had experienced in their previous 11 games against the Spanish side combined.

programme.title: Benfica vs Napoli - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Benfica and Napoli have met on four previous occasions in Europe – the Italian side have won three of those four matches, including both to take place in the UEFA Champions League. Napoli’s only previous away trip to face Benfica in the UEFA Champions League was in December 2016, winning 2-1 under Maurizio Sarri in their final group stage game that season.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: EPL The Big Interview 2025/2026
programme.desc: Extended sit-downs and more informal ‘out and about’ interviews with the Premier League’s biggest stars, providing players with a platform to tell their story in their own words.

programme.title: Metz vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 16 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Metz have lost each of their last 14 Ligue 1 matches against Paris Saint-Germain and could become only the second team to lose 15 consecutive matches against the same opponent in Ligue 1 history following Angers against… PSG. Paris SG have failed to win two of their last three away games against newly-promoted sides in Ligue 1, after winning their previous eight such matches.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Osasuna - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 16 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Villarreal have won four of their last eight LaLiga matches against Real Betis, but three of those wins have come away from home. Real Betis have scored points in their last three visits to Villarreal in LaLiga, winning the last two, their longest winning streak away from home against the Castellon side in the top flight.

programme.title: Deportivo Alaves vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 16 - Mini Match
programme.desc: FC Barcelona have won their last two LaLiga matches against Girona FC, both since Hansi Flick took charge, after failing to win any of their previous three – they could now record three consecutive wins against them for the first time in the competition. Girona have scored points in three of their five LaLiga away games against Barcelona, although they suffered their heaviest defeat in the competition in one of those matches, a 6-1 defeat in February 2018.

programme.title: Bayern Munchen vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6
programme.desc: This will be the fifth meeting between Bayern Munich and Sporting CP, all of which in the UEFA Champions League. Bayern are unbeaten in the previous four, winning three of them. The last time Bayern Munich and Sporting CP faced each other was in the Last 16 of the 2008-09 UEFA Champions League. Over two legs, the German side won 12-1 on aggregate, in what remains the biggest ever margin of victory in a UEFA Champions League knockout stage tie.

programme.desc: Monaco have faced Galatasaray on six previous occasions in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, winning half of those meetings. programme.title: Union Saint-Gilloise vs Olympique de Marseille - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6
programme.desc: The previous meetings between Union Saint-Gilloise and Marseille came 63 years ago, with the Belgian side eliminating their opponents in the first round of the 1962-63 Inter-Cities Fairs Cup. Union Saint-Gilloise were the first ever opponent that Marseille faced in European competition, doing so in September/October 1962. Since their last meeting, the French side have played a further 276 games in European competition.

programme.title: Senegal - Egypt - Final AFCON 2021
Nigeria vs Ivory Coast - Final - TotalEnergies CAF AFCON Cote dIvoire 2023
programme.desc: Ola Aina has created seven chances for Nigerian teammate Victor Osimhen at this year’s CAF Africa Cup of Nations – it’s the most by one teammate to another at an AFCON tournament since 2013, when Charles Kabore created nine chances for Aristide Bance for Burkina Faso. Côte dIvoire’s Evan Ndicka has completed 367 passes at this year’s CAF Africa Cup of Nations – since 2010, that is a record by a player at a single tournament. In an AFCON final in that time, the most passes completed by a player is 81 by Senegal’s Kalidou Koulibaly in 2021 vs Egypt.

programme.title: Special Coverage Arab Cup FIFA Qatar 2025
programme.desc: The second edition of the FIFA Arab Cup is scheduled to be held in Qatar from December 1 to 18, 2025. The tournament will be hosted across six venues, all of which were utilized during the FIFA World Cup™ three years prior. As with Qatar 2022, Al Bayt Stadium will host the tournaments opening match, while the prestigious Lusail Stadium will serve as the venue for the final. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the Arab Cup Qatar 2025 on BeIN Sports News.

programme.title: Fanes Atmosphere - Arab Cup FIFA Qatar 2025
programme.desc: The FIFA Arab Cup Qatar 2025 has successfully revived the vibrant festival atmosphere reminiscent of the World Cup in Qatar. The tournament has been transformed into an accessible, family-friendly public celebration through the implementation of large-scale fan zones, cultural activations, efficient transportation, and strategic promotions. A key element of this success is the establishment of numerous high-profile fan hubs, providing supporters with engaging spaces to gather well before kick-off.
